allow:
Bash(/c/WINDOWS/py -c "
import pymysql

conn = pymysql.connect\(
    host=''mysql.iavest.com.br'',
    user=''iavest01'',
    password=''Dsj2yF7w8uKo'',
    database=''iavest01'',
    port=3306
\)

cursor = conn.cursor\(\)

cursor.execute\(''SHOW TABLES''\)
tables = [t[0] for t in cursor.fetchall\(\)]
print\(''=== TABELAS ENCONTRADAS ===''\)
for t in tables:
    print\(f''  - {t}''\)
print\(\)

print\(''=== ESTRUTURA DAS TABELAS ===''\)
for table in tables:
    print\(f''\\n# {table}''\)
    print\(''-'' * 50\)
    cursor.execute\(f''DESCRIBE {table}''\)
    columns = cursor.fetchall\(\)
    for col in columns:
        field, type_, null, key, default, extra = col
        key_info = ''''
        if key == ''PRI'':
            key_info = '' [PK]''
        elif key == ''MUL'':
            key_info = '' [FK/IDX]''
        elif key == ''UNI'':
            key_info = '' [UQ]''
        print\(f''  {field}: {type_}{key_info}''\)

print\(''\\n\\n=== RELACIONAMENTOS \(FOREIGN KEYS\) ===''\)
cursor.execute\(''''''
    SELECT 
        TABLE_NAME,
        COLUMN_NAME,
        REFERENCED_TABLE_NAME,
        REFERENCED_COLUMN_NAME
    FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE
    WHERE REFERENCED_TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL
    AND TABLE_SCHEMA = ''iavest01''
    ORDER BY TABLE_NAME
''''''\)
fks = cursor.fetchall\(\)
if fks:
    for fk in fks:
        print\(f''  {fk[0]}.{fk[1]} -> {fk[2]}.{fk[3]}''\)
else:
    print\(''  Nenhuma FK explicita. Analisando por convencao de nomes...''\)
    
conn.close\(\)
")
Bash(export MYSQL_DB_HOSTNAME=mysql.iavest.com.br MYSQL_DB_USER=iavest01 MYSQL_DB_PASSWORD=Dsj2yF7w8uKo MYSQL_DB_NAME=iavest01 MYSQL_DB_PORT=3306)
